Summary: bright light came down for a few seconds, then descended upward. This happened twice with the same light
divs: Sighting DetailsI am shure It was not a plane. A bright light that was not flickering came down from the sky of course in high orbit. Moved forward for a second, and backwards for a seconds, then it dissaperared upwards. This happend twice then it was gone. I am preety dog on shure it was not a plane.
